titles.title: A resolution electing William H. Pickle of Colorado as the Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate.
A resolution electing William H. Pickle of Colorado as the Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on March 4, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Elects William H Pickle of Colorado as Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate.
